tool.name: Remove columns
tool.help:
This tool removes columns from a Flow text file.
-----
**Input files**
This tool can take txt, flowtext or tabular files as input.
**Output file**
The output is a tabular file, copy of the input file without the selected columns.
.. class:: infomark
Tip: If you need to change the file type of the output, you can do so by clicking on the pencil to edit attribute. Go to the Datatypes tab and change the type of your dataset.
-----
**Example**
*Input*::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 Marker4 34 45 12 35 33 65 10 54 19 62 98 65 12 36 58 23
Selected columns: 2,4
*Output*::
Marker1 Marker4 34 35 33 54 19 65 12 23
